mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.crm_customer_id AS "crmCustomer.id", a.crm_chance_id AS "crmChance.id", a.crm_contract_id AS "crmContract.id", a.sys_user_id AS "sysUser.id", a.content AS "content", a.pictures AS "pictures", a.files AS "files", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u2.name AS "crmCustomer.name", u3.name AS "crmChance.name", u4.name AS "crmContract.name", u5.name AS "sysUser.name"
